conversation.content: [extremely happy] I just ran the numbers again because I couldn't believe it the first time. We're there. We actually made it—five years ahead of schedule! [laugh] I keep thinking I must have, um, miscalculated something, but no, it's real. The portfolio, the passive income, everything you said would happen... it happened. [warm] God, I remember sitting in your office that first day, completely overwhelmed. I had this mountain of debt and zero savings, and you just—you just laid out this plan like it was so simple. [chuckle] "Trust the process," you kept saying. [slowly] And I did, even when it felt impossible. Even when I wanted to buy that stupid boat. [laugh loudly] Remember that? You talked me off that ledge real quick. [very sincerely] The discipline was hard, I'm not gonna lie. Watching friends take vacations while I was, uh, while I was meal prepping and driving that old Honda. But now? [pause] Now I wake up and I don't have to go anywhere I don't want to go. [excited] I can actually pursue that nonprofit idea! I can help other people get here too. [emotionally] You changed my life. You really did. [happy] I'm free.

subject: A target client achieving financial independence ahead of schedule with your guidance
